alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 2:14AM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY NEBRASKA PANHANDLE FIRE WEATHER ZONES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY SOUTHWEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM MDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 435...436 and 437. * WIND...Southwest winds 15-20 MPH with gusts up to 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 10 to 15 percent this afternoon. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
